title: Please disable Smite on URF.
body: It's really not fun having to lane 1v2 because people dont get the memo >.>

replies.body: It's easier to 1v2 in urf than it is in norms. At least in urf, you can spam abilities and get farm

Gives you less freedom.  Gives you less options for strategy.  Yeah, it can be annoying in some matchups.  Yeah your teammate should know that jungling isn't an effective strat in urf generally speaking.

> [{quoted}](name=AceGeo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JergY5Tj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-01T00:09:18.435+0000)
>
> Gives you less freedom.  Gives you less options for strategy.  Yeah, it can be annoying in some matchups.  Yeah your teammate should know that jungling isn't an effective strat in urf generally speaking.

In a premade 5 where everyone agrees whatever but really it's not enjoyable having to 1v2 in a mode that's on steroids where you basically feel helpless because someone wants to PvE while the mode kinda doesnt call for that.

do you not jg in pre-level 30 too just because the enemy does? At what point are we agreeing having 1 person get solo xp, while another person gets solo camps, verses 2 people that get less xp, is good?

there are also absolutely some champions that can solo the lanes and their entire lane is more their presence than anyone else that could join them too. I can pretty much solo 1v2 lane with zed his range and safety is so high.
But spamming challenging smite in lane is ok.
